scripts.deploy-gh-pages: rm -rf node_modules/.cache && rimraf out && next build && next export && touch out/.nojekyll && gh-pages -d out -t true
scripts.build-master: rm -rf node_modules/.cache && rm -rf out && rimraf out && next build && next export && touch out/.nojekyll
scripts.push-master: git add out/ && git commit -m "Deploy to gh-pages" && git push origin `git subtree split --prefix out master`:master --force
